main event: A white light, 1/2 times larger than a large star, was observed climbing and then flickering out.
interesting points: The light had characteristics of a meteor.
The observers included an air traffic control operator and other personnel at Travis Air Force Base.
Radar data and weather conditions at the time were included in the report.
The report was extracted from a submission by T/Sgt. Herron of the 1951 AACS Squadron.
sighted object: a white light, 1/2 times larger than a large star
witnesses: air traffic control operator and other personnel at Travis AFB
